titles.title: Caregiver Tax Relief Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit for taxpayers with long-term care needs.
Caregiver Tax Relief Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Caregiver Tax Relief Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow caregivers of family members or dependents with long-term care needs a refundable income-based tax credit of $2,500 for each such family member or dependent.
